name: Blast Fighters Royal B_F_R Bêta Test
name_original: Blast Fighters Royal B_F_R Bêta Test
description:
Link Ok
Battle Royal Game Online Or Lan Bêta Test Version
One Small Map For The Moment .
Input :
Interact : E
Move : W Or Z, A or Q, D, S
Swap Weapon : 1, 2, 3
Jump : Space
Crouch : CTRL Left
Walk : Hold C
Zoom : Mouse Right
Shoot : Mouse Left
Inventory : Tab (drag and drop in inventory)
First Person/ Third Person : X
my facebook, if you want to contact me for the game for tested and others : https://www.facebook.com/Average74
Please test with your all friends and me lol
And Comment Please ;)
